name: DateComponentsFormatter.UnitsStyle
desc: Constants for specifying how to represent quantities of time.

items.name: case spellOut
items.desc: A style that spells out the units and quantities of time.

items.name: case full
items.desc: A style that spells out the units of time, but not the quantities.

items.name: case short
items.desc: A style that uses a shortened spelling for units.

items.name: case brief
items.desc: A style that uses a shortened spelling for units of time that is shorter than DateComponentsFormatter.UnitsStyle.short.

items.name: case abbreviated
items.desc: A style that uses the most abbreviated spelling for units of time.

items.name: case positional
items.desc: A style that uses the position of a unit of time to identify its value.
